verses.verse: Take <S%G4337>heed<s%> that you <S%G4160>do<s%> not <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1654>alms<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> to be <S%G2300>seen<s%> of them: <S%G1490>otherwise<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> your <S%G1654>alms,<s%> do not <S%G4537>sound<s%> a <S%G4537>trumpet<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> you, as the <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> and in the <S%G4505>streets,<s%> that they may have <S%G1392>glory<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, They <S%G568>have<s%> their reward. <S%G3408><s%>
But when you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G1654>alms,<s%> let not your <S%G710>left<s%> hand <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> your <S%G1188>right<s%> hand does: <S%G4160><s%>

That <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1654>alms<s%> may be in <S%G2927>secret:<s%> and your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G991>sees<s%> in <S%G2927>secret<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> shall <S%G591>reward<s%> you openly. <S%G1722><s%>

And <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4336>pray,<s%> you shall not be as the hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> are: for they <S%G5368>love<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> and in the <S%G1137>corners<s%> of the <S%G4113>streets,<s%> that they may be <S%G5316>seen<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, They <S%G568>have<s%> their reward. <S%G3408><s%>

But you, <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> your <S%G5009>closet,<s%> and when you have <S%G2808>shut<s%> your <S%G2374>door,<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> to your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G2927>secret;<s%> and your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G991>sees<s%> in <S%G2927>secret<s%> shall <S%G591>reward<s%> you openly. <S%G1722><s%>

But when you <S%G4336>pray,<s%> use not vain <S%G945>repetitions,<s%> as the heathen <S%G1482><s%> do: for they <S%G1380>think<s%> that they shall be <S%G1522>heard<s%> for their <S%G4180>much<s%> speaking. <S%G4180><s%>

Be not you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3666>like<s%> to them: for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> things you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of, <S%G4253>before<s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> him.

<S%G3779>After<s%> <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>manner<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> you: Our <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G37>Hallowed<s%> be your name. <S%G3686><s%>
Your <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> Your <S%G2307>will<s%> be <S%G1096>done<s%> in <S%G1093>earth,<s%> as it is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
<S%G1325>Give<s%> us <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day<s%> our <S%G1967>daily<s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>
And <S%G863>forgive<s%> us our <S%G3783>debts,<s%> as we <S%G863>forgive<s%> our debtors. <S%G3781><s%>

And <S%G1533>lead<s%> us not <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3986>temptation,<s%> but <S%G4506>deliver<s%> us from <S%G4190>evil:<s%> For <S%G4675>your<s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and the <S%G1411>power,<s%> and the <S%G1391>glory,<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
For <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> their <S%G3900>trespasses,<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> you:

But <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G863>forgive<s%> not <S%G444>men<s%> their <S%G3900>trespasses,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> will <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> trespasses. <S%G3900><s%>

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G3522>fast,<s%> be not, as the <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> of a <S%G4659>sad<s%> <S%G4659>countenance:<s%> for they <S%G853>disfigure<s%> their <S%G4383>faces,<s%> that they may <S%G5316>appear<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G3522>fast.<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, They <S%G568>have<s%> their reward. <S%G3408><s%>
But you, when you <S%G3522>fast,<s%> <S%G218>anoint<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2776>head,<s%> and <S%G3538>wash<s%> your face; <S%G4383><s%>

That you <S%G5316>appear<s%> not to <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G3522>fast,<s%> but to your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G2927>secret:<s%> and your <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G991>sees<s%> in <S%G2927>secret,<s%> shall <S%G591>reward<s%> you openly. <S%G1722><s%>

Lay not up for <S%G5213>yourselves<s%> <S%G2344>treasures<s%> on <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4597>moth<s%> and <S%G1035>rust<s%> does <S%G853>corrupt,<s%> and <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2812>thieves<s%> <S%G1358>break<s%> <S%G1358>through<s%> and steal: <S%G2813><s%>

But lay up for <S%G5213>yourselves<s%> <S%G2344>treasures<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4597>moth<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1035>rust<s%> does <S%G853>corrupt,<s%> and <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2812>thieves<s%> do not <S%G1358>break<s%> <S%G1358>through<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> steal: <S%G2813><s%>
For <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> is, <S%G1563>there<s%> will <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> be also. <S%G2532><s%>

The <S%G5460>light<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> is the <S%G3788>eye:<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> be <S%G573>single,<s%> your <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> shall be <S%G5460>full<s%> of light. <S%G3088><s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> be <S%G4190>evil,<s%> your <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> shall be <S%G5460>full<s%> of <S%G4652>darkness.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> that is in you be <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> great <S%G4214><s%> is that darkness! <S%G4655><s%>

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2962>masters:<s%> for <S%G2228>either<s%> he will <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G1520>one,<s%> and <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2087>other;<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> else he will <S%G472>hold<s%> to the <S%G1520>one,<s%> and <S%G2706>despise<s%> the <S%G2087>other.<s%> You cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and mammon. <S%G3126><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, Take <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3309>thought<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>life,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G5315>eat,<s%> or <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G4095>drink;<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> yet for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G1746>put<s%> <S%G1746>on.<s%> Is not the <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> than <S%G5160>meat,<s%> and the <S%G4983>body<s%> than raiment? <S%G1742><s%>

<S%G1689>Behold<s%> the <S%G4071>fowls<s%> of the <S%G3772>air:<s%> for they <S%G4687>sow<s%> not, <S%G3761>neither<s%> do they <S%G2325>reap,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G596>barns;<s%> yet <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G5142>feeds<s%> them. Are you not <S%G3123>much<s%> <S%G1308>better<s%> than they?
<S%G5101>Which<s%> of you by taking <S%G3309>thought<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4369>add<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4083>cubit<s%> to his stature? <S%G2244><s%>

And <S%G5101>why<s%> take you <S%G3309>thought<s%> for <S%G1742>raiment?<s%> <S%G2648>Consider<s%> the <S%G2918>lilies<s%> of the <S%G68>field,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they <S%G837>grow;<s%> they <S%G2872>toil<s%> not, <S%G3761>neither<s%> do they spin: <S%G3514><s%>

And yet I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G1391>glory<s%> was not <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of these. <S%G5130><s%>

<S%G1161>Why,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G294>clothe<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%> of the <S%G68>field,<s%> which to <S%G4594>day<s%> is, and to <S%G839>morrow<s%> is <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the oven, <S%G2823><s%> shall he not <S%G4183>much<s%> more <S%G3123><s%> clothe you, O you of <S%G3640>little<s%> faith? <S%G3640><s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> take <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3309>thought,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G5315>eat?<s%> <S%G2228>or,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G4095>drink?<s%> <S%G2228>or,<s%> <S%G5101>Wherewithal<s%> shall we be clothed? <S%G4016><s%>

(For <S%G1934>after<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things do the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> seek: <S%G1934><s%> ) for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> that you have <S%G5535>need<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> things.

But <S%G2212>seek<s%> you <S%G4412>first<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and his <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things shall be <S%G4369>added<s%> to you.

Take <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3309>thought<s%> for the <S%G839>morrow:<s%> for the <S%G839>morrow<s%> shall take <S%G3309>thought<s%> for the things of <S%G1438>itself.<s%> <S%G713>Sufficient<s%> to the day <S%G2250><s%> is the <S%G2549>evil<s%> thereof. <S%G846><s%>
